question: As per the ‘Mukhyamantri Krishak Durghatna Kalyan Yojana’ of Uttar Pradesh, what amount of financial assistance is decided to give to the family of a deceased farmer?
explanation: As per the ‘Mukhyamantri Krishak Durghatna Kalyan Yojana’ of Uttar Pradesh, an amount of Rs. 5 Lakh financial assistance is decided to provide to the family of a deceased farmer. For 60% or more handicapped farmer Rs. 2 lakh will be provided. The age limit of the scheme is from 18 to 70 years. The beneficiaries will receive the amount within 45 days.
